title: Community courtyard and more at The Covington Apartments
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'show contact info', "If you're looking for a pet-friendly community with a variety of nearby activities, then check out Covington Apartment Homes today.", 'We have several different open floor plans that are sure to fit your lifestyle needs.', 'Contact Weidner Apartment Homes to check availability and learn about our leasing options.', 'Our amazing staff is excited to help you and your family become the newest residents of Bloomington, MN!', 'Bedrooms: 1 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 767 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1580 - $1640/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ Bike Storage', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Cardio Machines', '➢ Disposal Chutes', '➢ Elevator', '➢ Fire Pits', '➢ Guest Apartment', '➢ Pool', '➢ Rooftop Lounge', '➢ Weight Machines', '➢ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '➢ Barbecue/Grill Area', '➢ Corporate Suites', '➢ Furnished Units Available', '➢ Kingsley Excellence Award', '➢ Maintenance on Site', '➢ Package Receiving', '➢ Video Surveillance/Patrol', '➢ Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '➢ Yoga Classes Offered', 'This Unit Comes With:', '➢ 9 Foot Ceilings', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Floor to Ceiling Windows', '➢ Kitchen Island', '➢ Maple Cabinetry', '➢ Microwave', '➢ Oversized Windows', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '➢ Walk-In Closets', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '69F740396C8A45B']
